轅字的基本解释

轅
yuán
见“辕”。

轅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》雨元切，平元，云。］
“辕1”的繁体字。
(1)车前驾牲口用的直木。压在车轴上，伸出车舆的前端。古代大车、柏车、羊车皆用辕，左右各一。
(2)车。
(3)犁辕。
(4)指车轮的外缘。
(5)辕门。指行宫。
(6)辕门。指官署。
(7)同“爰”。更易。参见“轅田”。
(8)古地名。在今山东省禹城县境内。
(9)姓。春秋陈有辕涛塗。见《左传·僖公四年》。

轅字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轅； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1247第33
【廣韻】雨元切【集韻】【韻會】于元切，?音袁。【說文】輈也。【釋名】轅，援也。車之援也。【韻會】詩詁曰：車前曲木上鉤衡者謂之輈，亦曰轅。從軫以前稍曲而上至衡，則居衡之上而向下鉤之，衡卽輈端橫木，以駕馬者。　又轅門。【周禮·天官·掌舍】掌王會同之舍，設車宮轅門。【註】王者出行于外，次車爲藩，仰車以轅相向表門，故曰轅門。　又軒轅，黃帝號。【前漢·古今人表】黃帝作軒冕之服，故謂之軒轅氏。　又軒轅，星名。【史記·天官書】軒轅十二星。　又姓。【韻會】?大夫轅濤塗之後。　又軒轅，複姓。　又通作爰。【前漢·地理志】商鞅作轅田。【註】轅，與爰同。　又【集韻】于眷切【等韻】羽眷切，?音媛。地名。【左傳·哀十年】取犂及轅。【註】齊地。　又轘轅，縣名。【史記·樊噲傳】從攻長社、轘轅。【註】許州所屬縣也。

yuán

Yaw
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guangyun" Yuyuan cut, Pingyuan, cloud. ]
"辕1" in traditional characters.
(1) Straight wood for driving livestock in front of the vehicle. Press on the axle and stretch out the front end of the car. The ancient carts, cypresses, and sheep carts all used a cowl, one on the left and one on the left.
(2) Car.
(3) Ploughshare.
(4) Refers to the outer edge of the wheel.
(5) Yuanmen. Refers to the palace.
(6) Yuanmen. Refers to the official office.
(7) Same as "爰". Easier. See "Yuan Tian".
(8) Ancient place names. In today's Yucheng County, Shandong Province.
(9) Last name. Spring and Autumn Chen Youyuan Taotu. See "Zuo Zhuan · Four Years of Gong Xi".
Yaw
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　辕; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1247 33
[Guang Yun] Yu Yuanqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Yu Yuanqie,? Yin Yuan. [Said the text] Ye Ye. [Release name] Yuan, aid also. Che's aid also. 【Yunhui】The poem said: The people who are hooked and weighed on the bentwood of plantain are called the yin, and it is also the yin. Slightly curved from the front of the Zhen to the balance, it is above the balance and hooked down, and the balance is at the end of the crosswood to drive the horse.　Round the door again. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Zhang She】The house where the kings meet, with the car palace gate. [Note] The king travels outside, the second car is the feudal clan, and the car is leaning towards the gate of the watch, so it is called the gate of the gate.　You Xuanyuan, the Yellow Emperor. [Previous Han·Ancient and Modern People's Form] Huangdi made Xuanmian's clothing, so it is called Xuanyuan clan.　You Xuanyuan, star name. [Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials] Xuanyuan Twelve Stars.　Another last name. [Rhyme Club] After the doctor Yuan Tao painted.　You Xuanyuan, re-surname.　It's all over again. [Pre-Han · Geography] Shang Yang made Yuantian. 【Note】Yuan is the same as Yan.　 [Ji Yun] Yu Zhuan cut [Wai Yun] Yu Zhuan cut,? Yinyuan. Place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Sorrow for Ten Years] Take the plow and the shaft. [Note] Qi ground.　 and 轘辕, the name of the county. 【Historical Records·Fan Kui Biography】Cong Gong Changshe and Wanyuan. [Note] Xuzhou belongs to the county.
